Index.WhatIsExpanded:
The Parch Linux is a Linux distro based on Arch, that tried to be 
 pretty, easy to use, light, fast and stable.
Index.WhyCall: Why do we call this Parch?
Index.WhyCallExpanded:
At the beginning of our work, we planned to make Parch a platform for 
 Persian-speaking users, that's why we named it Parch ( Persian Arch ).
 But now we have more comprehensive goals than before.
Index.SimpleExpanded:
Parch linux uses calamares graphical installer by default which 
 makes it easier for you to install and use it.
Index.PrivacyExpanded:
Unlike any other proprietary operating systems, Parch Linux 
 respects your privacy and doesn't collect any information or data 
 from you.
Index.FastExpanded:
Parch Linux requires at least 1.5 GB of RAM with xfce desktop and 
 at least 1 GB with lxqt 
 desktop Give your old system a second chance with Parch Linux.
Index.CommunityExpanded:
Parch Linux in Telegram 
 has an active community that will quickly solve your problems. If you have a bug or problem, you can report it in the community.
Index.OpenSourceExpanded: Parch Linux and all its tools are completely open source.
